notes.0: 60% of enzymes used in industry generated by fungi. 15% of all vaccines come from engineered yeast. Even Citric acid (used in fizzy drinks) come from fungi
notes.1: Central to these mutualistic relationships are mycorrhizae, which are associations between fungal mycelium and plant roots. Mycorrhizal fungi colonize the root systems of plants, extending far into the soil.

notes.0: Montana, North Dakota and South Dakota.

title: thailand floating theater, Bulo Ole Scheeren

notes.0: Local fishermen farm lobsters on rafts. Wooden frames are tied by rubber straps to foam blocks wrapped in mosquito nets. A simple construction. A local technique.
notes.1: disassembled and goes back to local community

title: sustainable farming at home, pippa greenwood

notes.0: As the island is constantly rotating on its own axis due to the flow of the river beneath it, shearing occurs around its outer edge, eroding the island into its circular shape, similar to ice disks.
